item.title: Everything You Need to Know About Virtualization VMs Containers Pods Clusters
item.description: What is Virtualization? Virtualization is the act of dividing shared computational resources: CPU, RAM, Disk, and Networking into isolated resources that are unaware of the original shared scope. 虚拟化是将共享计算资源：CPU、RAM、磁盘和网络划分为不知道原始共享范围的孤立资源
